author: Diane Chambon
body: The tech, Samuel was great. It was an after hours call  and arrived within 1-1/2 hours. Samuel  answered all of our questions and explained what caused our clogged line.

author: KAREN RODRIGUEZ
body: Option One came to our house the same day we called for service.  Our kitchen sink was backing up.Robert was our tech.  He was professional and friendly.  We were given great service and since we’re in an older home, we were advised to ...

author: Cris Holmes
body: Robert got the job done on time and on budget. He had the old hot water heater out the new one in and everything cleaned up in less then two hours.

author: Margaret Donovan
body: Called to get estimates and they came right away same day.  Gentleman was very understanding about our problem and gave us recommendations on how to best take care of our problem.

author: Bill Shaw
body: Rep was on time, knowledgeable, well prepared, and courteous

author: Kris Hansen
body: Friendly knowledgeable technician arrived on time for off hours sewer cleaning.

author: Skip Creighton
body: Robert was on time, very friendly and cordial, and knew exactly how to tackle the stubborn drain back-up and tenaciously got it cleared. I'm very impressed!

author: Johnny Minatree
body: Call at 7.20pm they said get some one out in a hour 175.00 service call shows up at 9.40pm then said it 185.00 for cartridge that's 19.99 on Amazon then charges 14.40 to put on my card  so 374.40 for a19.99 cartridge that took 15 minutes ...

author: Phill Bugs
body:
Arrived on time, Sammy the tech was very friendly tech, took care of my drains and gave me good advice to avoid the same problems in the future.
They have always been my go to for plumbing.

author: Tobey Kackley
body: Sam was excellent!  Great worker and very knowledgeable!  Awesome experience!

author: Andy Jones
body: Samuel showed up quickly and efficiently diagnosed our plumbing issue. Within 30 miinutes, it was fixed and we were back up and running.

author: Michelle Harbaugh
body: I use option one plumbing for all my properties  All staff is helpful and courteous. I couldn't ask for a better plumbing company.

author: Philip Conmy
body: Prompt, courteous, priced as advertised -able to provide complex services within 24 hours

author: Arlena Atkins
body: Matt came out to snake my toilet. He was super nice and efficient thanks Matt. It was great talking with you.

author: Ana Solivagant
body: Thank you so much Matt, I appreciate your hard work. Thanks for coming out same day and staying late. I will make sure to use you again in the future. Great experience.

author: Nancy Stouffer
body: Sammy and Robert and all of their other technicians have always done a great job for us. Communication is great and they can always fix our problem. They are courteous and conscientious and I highly recommend them!

author: April Silber
body: Andrew was great!

author: Testing Testing
body: Andrew arrived on schedule today November 9, 2018 and was very professional and diligent figuring out why my water heater was not working. He isolated the problem from the fuse box. His advice on how to take care of the water heater subsequently was very much appreciated. I was quite satisfied indeed! Phyl - Mesa Az

author: Daniel Weddle
body:
Review would be five star if they weren't so pricey.
 
If you are looking for competent service FAST, Option One is for you. 
They have a very modern and efficient system.  

Service person contacts you when he's on the way with a text ...

author: Ken Garcia
body: Samuel was very helpful and professional. I have used this company 3 times and have been very satisfied each time. Wouldn't hesitate to use them again.

author: jimmy Staats
body: I have used this company many times. They have always done a great job and are very reasonable on their prices. I would recommend them anytime.

author: Gordo rodriguez
body: Always pleasure doing business with on our plumbing

author: Bryan Kovalesky
body: Matt is awesome!

author: Jinxie G
body: Quick, great service! Robert was friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. He even gave us pointers on a few other items. Even Princess the Chihuahua liked him. Great job, thanks!

author: Marina Leyzbovskay
body:
We used Option one plumbing for 8 years and very happy with the service. Although prices increased in the past couple of years it is still reasonable compared to the other companies. 
They usually send the technician the same day but charge a little more if it is a weekend.

author: Jodi nolen
body: Opiian One is not only a great plumbing company They also do great work with A/C Matter of fact Derick is a graet HVAC Tech,  He found a problem with a brand new a/c unit and seen for him self the resident was the one who tampered with ...

author: Ezra Raphael
body: We have used Option One Plumbling multiple times.  We have found them to be honest & timely.  They gave us choices on how to fix problems in our old house and let us know what to expect with each option and the price.  Highly recommend.

author: Roger Helm
body: Timely service and professional.

author: Wayne Henderson
body: Service person was on time, troubleshoot the problem, repaired the problem. Service man was courteous and well groomed.  Also, repair cost was same as estimate. No surprises.  We would recommend your company and we would use Option One in the future.  Thanks.

author: Nicole Sellers
body: I’ve used them previously for work and have used them 3 times now for my personal home. They’ve always come same day and came back to check on their work, even in 4th of July!

author: michael stark
body: I have a solar assisted water heater, apparently very rare even in Arizona. Most plumbers will not touch them. Option One took care of it even getting me the tank on warranty.  Only challenge was they had to come back a couple times to ...

author: All Out Enterprises
body: I thought Option One did just drain clearings. I have used them for a few commercial properties I manage.  I am so glad that I called them to try to fix what I thought was the unfixable.  They fixed a roof drain that has been leaking ...

author: Laura Marlowe
body: My normal Plumber was unavailable. I had a leaking pipe on the roof of our house. Option one send a technician out the same day. He was very helpful fixed the leak and also noticed there was another place that was going to break soon… ...

author: Carmen H
body: Great phone interaction; technician was amazing;  kind and knowledgeable and trust me my “problem” was ugly. He solved it properly. Thank you

author: Brandy Rose
body: Service was great and the tech Matt was efficient and professional!!

author: Lisa mckinney mcmahon
body: I use this company cause they don't break my bank account and the work never fails me. They're techs, especially Matt is an awesome tech

author: Duane Badger
body: Have only had initial visit for estimate, but good so far. Robert was professional  and knowledgeable.  We'll see how it goes.

author: Patrick Harris
body: Option One once again has done excellent work for us in an older home. Our repairman Robert is a true professional. He took the time and effort to correctly repair a worn cast iron toilet flange and reset the toilet.  This on a job that I started but needed greater expertise. Much appreciated!

author: vick stumberg
body: Fast, friendly and efficient! We were in a jam and they awesome. Thank you!

author: Bradley Moore
body: Came out same day to provide an estimate for main drain replacement.  After other estimates, we will see if they get the job.

author: Sheila Joyce
body: Option One treated me so kindly and respectfully. They were extremely professional!  Derrick and Tim S. really helped me out of a bad situation and I am very grateful!

author: judy couffer
body: Very thankful for the repair that  another company left me with a broken pipe that they stated was already broken under my home and no water in master bathroom. Would highly recommend you to anyone. Thank you again Robert!

author: Ryan Rybarczyk
body: Very good experience. Took care of the plumbing issue, sent pics and great price! Would recommend.

author: isaac cruz
body:
very good experience. Bath sink clogged. Took tech Derick first 10 min to figure out a large black cap (looks like toothpaste but not) was clogging the drain. Charged 83 cash or 86 credit card. Once removed tested and continuous flow of water. Thx !
-Isaac

author: Cody Blevins
body: Option One Plumbing performed outstandingly. I had been having an issue with a drain for a few weeks, dragging my feet and insisting to my wife I could fix it. I finally broke down and called Option One expecting to pay an arm and a leg ...

author: Konstantine Vrazhilov
body: I spoke to a couple of companies to obtain quotes for a pipe replacement and this one was the most responsive, best priced, and most importantly willing to fix any issues that came up, even after I already gave them the job and paid my ...

author: Margery Chandler
body: Andrew was awesome! We loved him! He was super fast and friendly and explained everything thoroughly. I wish everyone that we hire was as professional but also as super nice as Andrew. He fixed everything right up for us. A person in a ...

author: Barbi Smith
body: I work for a Phoenix School and we call these guys ALL the time! They are always quick and always solve the problem at a decent price! I wouldn't want to call anyone else.

author: Dee Onelttoove
body: Your worker is not very nice, driving down the road flipping people off and honking.

author: Michael Heppa
body: Fast and thorough work, I couldn't have asked for more!

author: JR Lyles
body: I have used Option One a few times. They have always come through for me and been very considerate of whatever situation I faced.

author: Becky Thomas
body: I've always called Option One for all my plumbing needs.  They're always reasonably priced and honest. The techicians are always professional and polite. To make sure you feel confident about the plumbing professional's you hire.  I ...

author: Otaku4Life
body: Very good service   Matt was very helpful and friendly very professional.

author: Tanya Elizabeth
body: On time, friendly, knowledgeable!

author: Rossetti Management
body: I am always happy with the work option one technicians do for my properties.

author: Patrick O' Sullivan
body: I had a real problem on a Saturday it may took care of it in a professional away in charge me a fair price for what they did. My home warranty company sent out an incompetent plumber that couldn't do anything on Friday but tell me what ...

author: Jerry Wood
body: Andrew was outstanding knew just what to do was in and out of here in an hour we're back up and draining!

author: Tilina Fowler
body: Excellent customer service and many thanks to Robert Garcia for doing an amazing job. Will definitely refer to family and friends.

author: Vyron Miller
body: Derrek did a great job . I'm happy and satisfied  with the repair. He was very professional. I will recommend Option one to all my friends.

author: Jay Martinez
body: Robert was thorough and did a great job on the sewer scope inspection--he seemed very knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend Option One Plumbing.

author: Gregory ColtetGregoryC
body: I’ll never use this company again. I had them replace my garbage disposal. First time they came it wasn’t installed right. Second time they forgot to remove the plug that goes to the dish washer and I ended up lightly flooding my ...

author: Pamela Hopkins
body: Option One Plumbing was professional, knowledgeable and they went the extra mile .  They took off the toilet then had to run the line above.  It was a big problem that they had to figure out the cause and the source.  Andrew did that expertly.

author: matt peterson
body: Very professional. Unlike past plumbers they are actually courteous of your house and their surrondings. Which is huge with us when having people over. Robert (our tech) was also very professional an knowledgeable. Took time to explain ...

author: Alex Khazanovich
body:
We used to hire this company a lot to clean the drain pipes in our houses - the service was OK, but the price was hard to beat - the $49.99 was  painted prominently on their service vans. It was a good value. 
In the last little while ...

author: Jet Li
body: Professional. Fast. Friendly.

author: Phyllis Schibonski
body: I have a very positive review of Option one. Derrick was my technician and he was well qualified and a very nice person. I got a new water heater along with a new faucet and new insides for my toilets. Derrick was polite and cleaned up everything. 5 stars for you.  I will recommend Option One Plumbing. Phyllis Schibonski

author: Mike Mosier
body: I have been using Option One Plumbing for several years personally and as a real estate agent. They did a full sewer replacement on my personal property as well as numerous miscellaneous plumbing jobs. I have referred Option One to my ...

author: NKN E.
body: Called them at 10:30pm on  Thursday night concerned I may have an emergency. Was told it would be $250 "Just to come out". Scheduled an appointment for the next day instead, thinking I would fair better. Was given am appointment window ...

author: Miss P B
body: Have used them several times for my rental property in Tempe.  They always show up immediately which is so important to me.  This go round the tech even offered to come twice since renter wasn't home.

author: Curtis Day
body: Sammy showed up on time, in fact a little early! We showed him where we knew the problem was and he snaked it like we asked. Very prompt, very knowledgeable and very friendly. . . great job!!

author: Dianne Abram
body: very pleased with the work and warranty and the tech was great

author: Nicole Lena
body: Quoted time was between 11-1.. got here before 11, came in listened to us looked at the issue and then gave us a price that was amazing! Fixed the issue in a timely matter and were completely friendly. This is a great company that will be called if we ever need a plumber again.

author: Kittiya S
body: Amazing value, very happy with customer service too.  We needed septic line rootered, and it only cost $83 for everything.  Called Friday night after 8 PM,  it was very easy to setup the appointment for Monday.  The plumber who arrived ...

author: chad warhus
body: Worst so called plumbers ever. Hired them to fix a slow drain. They showed up over 4 hours late. They snaked the main drain with some antique snake machine for 1 hour and could get it fixed. Then they used a camera and said it was a ...

author: EM RG
body: Please do not use this company ever! I am filling a better business bureau claim and will be filing a lawsuit against this company as a serious issue has not been resolved. I wish I would have read all the negative Yelp reviews before ...

author: Amy Charette
body: Devin Melody provided outstanding service!  He has a "can do" attitude even when the job is challenging.  He located our clean-out that 2 previous plumbers did not recognize.  And he uncovered the source of the problem creating the ...

author: Victor Ditingo
body: Best plumbing service in the whole valley! Matt saved my life a couple times now. I won't call anyone else.

author: Peter J.
body:
Did a job at our house a while back ($2,200) and bleeped up leaving a lot of sand in our system (just didn't clean the pipes properly before reconnecting), cloaking a few faucets (you can actually hear the sand in the valves).

Came in ...

author: Sherale C.
body: They came out on Superbowl Sunday and provided excellent service at a friends house who was preparing for guest to arrive. They were very fast and extremely nice. I'd highly recommend their services. :)

author: Robert Pollard
body: The workers were courteous & proficient on a complicated job. I would gladly call them first, should the need arise again. Thanks Deven!  Bob Pollard/Phoenix, Az

author: Ute Poole
body: There areno plumbers, only plumbing techs!  They quoted me and I paid almost $8,000.00 for them to dig and replace my 1945 sewer line that was clogged.  Instead they jack hammered in my bedroom and attached the sewer line to my tenants, ...

author: ldc136
body: Do not use these plumbers. They couldn't fix my simple drain problem. THE WORST 49.95 I have ever spent. They only got the main line to drain slowly, the first time and I asked they continue to snake it since it was clearly not fully ...

author: Amanda goodwin
body: I would not use this plumbing company again. I used them for the first time 2 weeks ago and the problem got fixed, but the technician was rude and smelled of stale cigarettes. I called them again today and they never showed up, I even waited an extra hour and still no call or anything so I called and cancelled.

author: Celena Hiasashi
body: ABSOLUTELY will recommend this company over and over again! Shilo is simply the nicest service technician I have had the pleasure of dealing with! The work looks amazing, the price is perfect and the service was exceptional! Always on ...

author: Mahala Brown
body: From booking my appointment to the technician getting in his van and leaving, my experience with this company was wonderful! From start to finish they were friendly, knowledgeable, timely, and the price could not be beat! I will surely call for any and all future plumbing needs!!

author: Magalli Flores
body: I called Option One Plumbing for a drain that I had been having problems with. Dispatch let me know that a technician would call me 30 minutes ahead of time. Technician by the name of Andrew called and said he was on his way to fix the ...

author: Eric Seidl
body:
Overall, the end result was very good. However, the process was not what I had expected.
I had a leak coming from my upstairs bathtub drain (the only shower in my house) that leaked through the floor/ceiling to the downstairs dining ...

author: Chris Boyce
body: STAY AWAY!!!  Had an appointment for 12-2pm today and they called at 1:55pm to say they would be 1hr & 30mins late.  At 5:40pm (2hrs & 10mins after the new time they quoted) we called them back and told them about the situation.  They lady on the phone was extremely rude and did not offer any assistance in the matter.

author: Bill Petrie
body:
CAUTION, STAY AWAY!
In January 2012, these guys, techs Tim & Rob, beat me out of $485 and destroyed 24 ft of underground sewer line that I had to replace.  They ran a camera in my line and told me my piping was clay and recommended ...

author: David Marino
body: Option One Plumbing saved the day. I made the mistake of putting very large amount of cooked rice down disposal on Superbowl Sunday making essentially rice pudy in my main line. Because they were so close to my house I first called ...
